document_data.name: Hastor el Khafar
document_data.mainbody: Shieldlord '''Hastor el Khafar''' ran a fighting school at one of the shrines to [[Tempus]] in [[Memnon]].
document_data.Activites: In [[1370 DR]], Hastor took on a [[sea elf]] student named [[Vyaalis]], whom he trained in secret, teaching him how to fight on land in exchange for the latter teaching him how to fight below the waves.
